pages.text: Whoever comes with good, then for him is (a reward) better than that and they will be among those who will be secure from the horror of that day
And Whoever comes with evil, they will be thrown on their faces into the fire. Will you be rewarded (for something) other than that which you used to do
I am commanded only to serve the Fosterer of this city (of Mecca) which He has made sacred and to Whom belongs everything, and I am commanded to be among those who submit (as Muslims)

and to read (and follow ) the Quran, because one who receives guidance, then he receives guidance only (for the benefit) of his own soul, and one who goes astray,( does so for his own loss), then say (to him, “ I am only of those who warn.”)
And say, “Praise is due only for Allah Who will show His signs to you, so that you will recognize them, and your Fosterer is not unaware of what you do.”
Those are the signs of the book that makes clear
We recite to you (something) from the history of Musa and Firawn with truth, for a people who believe

Firawn certainly exalted himself in the land and made its people (divided) into sects, weakening a party from among them, getting their sons slaughtered and leaving their women alive, he was certainly among those who caused corruption
And We intended to bestow favour on those who were weakened in the land and make them leaders and make them the inheritors
